properties.name: name
properties.description: The full name of the speaker.

properties.name: role
properties.description: The professional role or title of the speaker.
example_values: Director Methods Center for Causal Inference

properties.name: organization
properties.description: The organization or center the speaker is affiliated with.

properties.name: tenure_in_current_role
properties.description: Indicates how long the speaker has been in their current role.

properties.name: expertise_areas
properties.description: Specific areas of professional expertise or specialization.

properties.name: uses_ai_tools
properties.description: Whether the speaker uses AI tools in their work.

properties.name: ai_tools_used
properties.description: Specific AI tools or platforms the speaker has used.

properties.name: ai_usage_trend
properties.description: The trend in the speaker's AI tool usage over time.

properties.name: primary_work_activity
properties.description: The main professional activity or focus of the speaker.

properties.name: perception_of_rand_ai_adoption
properties.description: The speaker's view on the pace of AI adoption within RAND compared to others.

properties.name: personal_feelings_on_ai_impact
properties.description: The speaker's personal feelings or concerns regarding the broader impact of AI on their work or profession.

properties.name: ai_concerns
properties.description: Specific ethical or practical concerns the speaker has about using AI tools.

properties.name: ai_use_cases
properties.description: Specific tasks or applications for which the speaker uses AI.

properties.name: ai_adoption_barriers_at_rand
properties.description: Perceived barriers to AI adoption within RAND.

properties.name: need_for_ai_training_at_rand
properties.description: Whether the speaker perceives a need for more AI training or education at RAND.
